!Mysterious Wizard: You seem to know how things work. Allow me then to tell you my dilemma. If you go east from here, you will find the *Swamp of Screams*. In that place, there are *Needle Stakatos* romaing around, some of whom are called *Needle Stakato Drones* [Quest _236_SeedsOfChaos 31522_02.htm|Ask him what he wants with them.]
